List applications

### Synopsis

List all applications in cluster

```
vela ls
```

### Examples

```
vela ls
```

### Options

```
  -e, --env string         specify environment name for application
  -h, --help               help for ls
  -n, --namespace string   specify the Kubernetes namespace to use
```
